con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="SecurityTokenService" targetNamespace="http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-sx/ws-trust/200512" xmlns:ns1="http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-sx/ws-trust/200512/" xmlns:ns2="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/http" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:soap12="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap12/" xmlns:tns="http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-sx/ws-trust/200512" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:import location="http://localhost:8081/requestsecuritytoken?wsdl=SecurityTokenService.wsdl" namespace="http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-sx/ws-trust/200512/"></wsdl:import> <wsdl:binding name="SecurityTokenServiceSoapBinding" type="ns1:SecurityTokenService"> <soap12:binding style="document" transport="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap/bindings/HTTP/"/> <wsdl:operation name="RequestSecurityToken2"> <soap12:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="RequestSecurityToken2"> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="RequestSecurityToken2Response"> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="RequestSecurityToken"> <soap12:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="RequestSecurityToken"> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="RequestSecurityTokenResponse"> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="SecurityTokenService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:SecurityTokenServiceSoapBinding" name="SecurityTokenService"> <soap:address location="requestsecuritytoken"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>
